commands.name: az iot ops broker delete
commands.syntax:
az iot ops broker delete --instance
                         --name
                         --resource-group
                         [--yes {false, true}]
examples: az iot ops broker delete -n broker --in mycluster-ops-instance -g myresourcegroup
az iot ops broker delete -n broker --in mycluster-ops-instance -g myresourcegroup -y

commands.name: az iot ops broker list
commands.summary: List mqtt brokers associated with an instance.
examples: az iot ops broker list --in mycluster-ops-instance -g myresourcegroup

commands.name: az iot ops broker show
commands.summary: Show details of an mqtt broker.
examples: az iot ops broker show -n broker --in mycluster-ops-instance -g myresourcegroup
